channel.title: Simplicity is a form of art... - cyanogenmod

item.title: Switched to Lineage OS
item.description: I have been a long time user of Cyanogenmod, which discontinued its services end of 2016. Due to lack of (continuous) time, I was not able to switch over toward a different ROM. Also, I wasn't sure if LineageOS would remain the best choice for me or not. I wanted â€¦
item.dc:creator: Sven Vermeulen
